about_the_game: Coffee Dates is a passionately crafted visual novel about getting to know your oddball co-workers at a humble little coffee shop. Each one of them has their own unique ambitions that you'll get roped into, which only escalate in scale and weirdness as you progress. Enjoy our hand-crafted art style and expressive character animations. Play some mini-games between those long sessions of dialog reading. Ultimately, Coffee Dates is a lighthearted game designed to give you some good laughs and some wholesome feels.

content_descriptors.notes: I'm pretty sure I used the word sex when making this game. Also there's 1 scene that's a little gory but its not violent and of course the art style is far from realistic

detailed_description: Coffee Dates is a passionately crafted visual novel about getting to know your oddball co-workers at a humble little coffee shop. Each one of them has their own unique ambitions that you'll get roped into, which only escalate in scale and weirdness as you progress. Enjoy our hand-crafted art style and expressive character animations. Play some mini-games between those long sessions of dialog reading. Ultimately, Coffee Dates is a lighthearted game designed to give you some good laughs and some wholesome feels.
legal_notice: All music and sound effects were acquired legally from the open source licenses provided by Zapsplat & Soundimages.org. Credits can also be found in game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 10, Or Windows 11
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Coffee Dates is a fun and lighthearted visual novel about hanging out with your crazy co-workers and the comedic shenanigans that unfold. There's even a few bits of game play that aren't just reading. Isn't that cool!
